name: 黃博峙
objective: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
schedule:
1. Techniques of integration: 
    integration by parts & trigonometric substitutions
2. Techniques of integration: partial fractions & improper integrals
3. Applications of integration: areas between curves & volumes
4. Applications of integration: arc length & surface area
5. Parametric equations and polar coordinates: calculus with parametric curves
6. Parametric equations and polar coordinates: calculus in polar coordinates
7. Vectors and the geometric of space
8. Partial derivatives: limits,  partial derivatives, & tangent planes
9. Midterm
10. Partial derivatives: 
      chain rule, directional derivatives, extreme values, & lagrange multipliers
11. Multiple integrals: double integrals and its applications
12. Multiple integrals: triple integrals and its applications
13. Series: convergence tests
14. Series: Taylor and Maclaurin series
15. Vector calculus: vector fields & line integrals
16. Vector calculus: curl, divergence, & surface integrals
17. Vector calculus: Stokes's and divergence theorem
18. Final exam
